data.name: One Hell of a Trip
data.detailed_description:
One soul that fall into the hell, caged by one demon, it throw him to endless dungeon area, force him to fight against monsters and entertain itself.

You will play as that innocent soul, pick up various weapons, use different magic element power to fight for your own way out.

  • Twelve different weapons, including cold steel, firearms and magic wands.
  • All weapons can attach magic element power, there are five different kinds of element in total.
  • Some elements can take reaction between each other, and release out different effects.
  • Use weapons and magic power to fight against seven different kinds of monster inside the dungeon.
  • Each kind of monster has its own ability and trait, please take care for them.
data.about_the_game:
One soul that fall into the hell, caged by one demon, it throw him to endless dungeon area, force him to fight against monsters and entertain itself.

You will play as that innocent soul, pick up various weapons, use different magic element power to fight for your own way out.

  • Twelve different weapons, including cold steel, firearms and magic wands.
  • All weapons can attach magic element power, there are five different kinds of element in total.
  • Some elements can take reaction between each other, and release out different effects.
  • Use weapons and magic power to fight against seven different kinds of monster inside the dungeon.
  • Each kind of monster has its own ability and trait, please take care for them.
data.short_description: This is a 2D double joystick action adventure game, play as an innocent soul who falls into hell, pick up your weapon and use the power of different magic elements to fight for survival in the dungeon full of traps and monsters.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Duo 2.4, AMD Athlon(TM) X2 2.8 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GS, Radeon HD4000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Quad 2.7 Ghz, AMD Phenom(TM)II X4 3 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 260, Radeon HD 5770
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
